actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill entitled the "James River Basin Flood Control Act".
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Modifies the project for flood control in the James River Basin, Richmond, Virginia, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct the project at a total cost of $134 million, with an estimated Federal cost of $100.5 million and an estimated non-Federal cost of $33.5 million.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "James River Basin Flood Control Act".
